1.label: Synchronization Cool And Heat Temperature Set-point
1.description: Synchronization cool and heat temperature set-point while one of it has been change by master controller

2.label: Inner Master Mcu Communication Address
2.description: Should same as inner master mcu configuration

metadata.inclusion:
Start master controller add device mode as instruction, press 3 time of PB button located on the back side of thermostat panel in 1.5 second,
LED flash indicator inclusion processing until included or 60 second timeout no detect any master controller
metadata.exclusion: Start master controller remove device mode as instruction, press 3 time of PB button located on the back side of thermostat panel in 1.5 second, LED flash indicator exclusion processing until excluded or 5 second timeout no detect any master controller
metadata.reset:
Please use this procedure only when the network primary controller is missing or otherwise inoperable.

Press and hold PB button located on the back side of thermostat
panel for 10 seconds retrieve thermostat panel factory default
